1 #ifndef SHADER_H
2 #define SHADER_H
3 
4 #include <iostream>
5 #include <string>
6 #include <fstream>
7 #include <sstream>
8 #include <GL/glew.h>
9 #include <glm/glm.hpp>
10 #include <glm/gtc/type_ptr.hpp>
11 
12 class Shader {
13 public:
14  unsigned int ID;
15 
16  Shader(const std::string& vertexPath, const std::string& fragmentPath) {
17  std::string vertexCode, fragmentCode;
18  std::ifstream vertexFile, fragmentFile;
19 
20  vertexFile.exceptions(std::ifstream::failbit | std::ifstream::badbit);
21  fragmentFile.exceptions(std::ifstream::failbit | std::ifstream::badbit);
22 
23  try {
24  vertexFile.open(vertexPath);
25  fragmentFile.open(fragmentPath);
26  std::stringstream vertexStream, fragmentStream;
27 
28  vertexStream << vertexFile.rdbuf();
29  fragmentStream << fragmentFile.rdbuf();
30 
31  vertexFile.close();
32  fragmentFile.close();
33 
34  vertexCode = vertexStream.str();
35  fragmentCode = fragmentStream.str();
36  } catch (std::ifstream::failure& e) {
37  std::cout << "ERROR::SHADER::FILE_NOT_SUCCESSFULLY_READ" << std::endl;
38  }
39 
40  const char* vertexShaderCode = vertexCode.c_str();
41  const char* fragmentShaderCode = fragmentCode.c_str();
42 
43  unsigned int vertexShader, fragmentShader;
44  int success;
45  char infoLog[512];
46 
47  vertexShader = glCreateShader(GL_VERTEX_SHADER);
48  glShaderSource(vertexShader, 1, &vertexShaderCode, nullptr);
49  glCompileShader(vertexShader);
50  glGetShaderiv(vertexShader, GL_COMPILE_STATUS, &success);
51  if (!success) {
52  glGetShaderInfoLog(vertexShader, 512, nullptr, infoLog);
53  std::cout << "ERROR::SHADER::VERTEX::COMPILATION_FAILED\n" << infoLog << std::endl;
54  }
55 
56  fragmentShader = glCreateShader(GL_FRAGMENT_SHADER);
57  glShaderSource(fragmentShader, 1, &fragmentShaderCode, nullptr);
58  glCompileShader(fragmentShader);
59  glGetShaderiv(fragmentShader, GL_COMPILE_STATUS, &success);
60  if (!success) {
61  glGetShaderInfoLog(fragmentShader, 512, nullptr, infoLog);
62  std::cout << "ERROR::SHADER::FRAGMENT::COMPILATION_FAILED\n" << infoLog << std::endl;
63  }
64 
65  ID = glCreateProgram();
66  glAttachShader(ID, vertexShader);
67  glAttachShader(ID, fragmentShader);
68  glLinkProgram(ID);
69  glGetProgramiv(ID, GL_LINK_STATUS, &success);
70  if (!success) {
71  glGetProgramInfoLog(ID, 512, nullptr, infoLog);
72  std::cout << "ERROR::SHADER::PROGRAM::LINKING_FAILED\n" << infoLog << std::endl;
73  }
74 
75  glDeleteShader(vertexShader);
76  glDeleteShader(fragmentShader);
77  }
78 
79  void use() {
80  glUseProgram(ID);
81  }
82 
83  // Utility functions for setting shader uniforms
84  void setBool(const std::string& name, bool value) const {
85  glUniform1i(glGetUniformLocation(ID, name.c_str()), (int)value);
86  }
87 
88  void setInt(const std::string& name, int value) const {
89  glUniform1i(glGetUniformLocation(ID, name.c_str()), value);
90  }
91 
92  void setFloat(const std::string& name, float value) const {
93  glUniform1f(glGetUniformLocation(ID, name.c_str()), value);
94  }
95 
96  void setVec3(const std::string& name, const glm::vec3& value) const {
97  glUniform3fv(glGetUniformLocation(ID, name.c_str()), 1, glm::value_ptr(value));
98  }
99 
100  void setMat4(const std::string& name, const glm::mat4& value) const {
101  glUniformMatrix4fv(glGetUniformLocation(ID, name.c_str()), 1, GL_FALSE, glm::value_ptr(value));
102  }
103 };
104 
105 #endif
